release dates: UK::28 April 2012                            (BBC World Service Arabic TV)
imdb.plot outline: A thematic weekly 50 minute programme presenting international short films in full, and featuring interviews around films (of any genre or length) and themes that push artistic and cultural boundaries, or that influence and shape our world. The programme is in its 6th series (with 35 episodes in each series) , with the 7th series in development. It is broadcast on Sundays at 7pm GMT on BBC Arabic TV.
imdb.title: Alternative Cinema
plot: A thematic weekly 50 minute programme presenting international short films in full, and featuring interviews around films (of any genre or length) and themes that push artistic and cultural boundaries, or that influence and shape our world. The programme is in its 6th series (with 35 episodes in each series) , with the 7th series in development. It is broadcast on Sundays at 7pm GMT on BBC Arabic TV.::Mona Deeley
